header.presentation: And I create intuitive and dynamic user experiences for websites and applications, ensuring maximum usability.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.aboutP1: I'm passionate about motorcycles, sports, and nutrition, finding joy in staying active and healthy through exercise and balanced eating habits. Riding through nature on my motorcycle is my ideal way to clear my mind.
aboutMe.aboutP2: I'm always eager to learn and grow in all aspects of life, believing strongly in maintaining an active lifestyle and continually seeking knowledge to thrive both personally and professionally.

experience.exp1: Although I don’t yet have professional experience in the development world, I have invested a lot of time and effort into learning and creating projects on my own.
experience.exp2: nstead of seeing this as a disadvantage, I believe it has allowed me to be self-taught and develop problem-solving abilities in a certain way. I’m always looking for challenges that allow me to grow and improve my skills.
experience.title: Experience

projects.title: Projects
projects.urlp: His is a real-time cryptocurrency quote tool, featuring the day's most important news in the crypto world.
projects.criptop: A cryptocurrency converter allows users to quickly convert between different cryptocurrencies and traditional currencies. It provides real-time exchange rates and supports a variety of cryptocurrencies, offering a convenient tool for tracking and managing crypto investments.
projects.fitnessp: An app that calculates the meals you consume throughout the day along with the exercise you do, and generates a total energy balance for your day.
projects.gamep: Animal matching pairs game with a timer.
projects.ecomercep: Headphones e-commerce with integrated store and simulated payment.
projects.guitarp: Project of a guitar store with an included shopping cart.
